{"id":601613856,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1639464274,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/601613856/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Rectangle Area","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int computeArea(int ax1, int ay1, int ax2, int ay2, int bx1, int by1, int bx2, int by2) {\n        auto area = [&](int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2){\n            return (x2-x1) * (y2-y1);\n        };\n        bool X = false,Y = false;\n        if((bx1 <= ax1 && ax1 <= bx2) || (ax1 <= bx1 && bx1 <= ax2)) X = true;\n        if((by1 <= ay1 && ay1 <= by2) || (ay1 <= by1 && by1 <= ay2)) Y = true;\n        \n        bool overlap = X & Y;\n        \n        int total = area(ax1,ay1,ax2,ay2) + area(bx1,by1,bx2,by2);\n        if(!overlap) return total;\n        \n        vector<int> x = {ax1,ax2,bx1,bx2};\n        vector<int> y = {ay1,ay2,by1,by2};\n        \n        sort(x.begin(),x.end());\n        sort(y.begin(),y.end());\n        \n        return total - area(x[1],y[1],x[2],y[2]);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"rectangle-area"}
